name: Survivor's Tax
description: The Ultimate Top-Down Zombie Shooter by Super Salt Studio. Pay the price and join the fight for survival in a world overrun by the undead. With stunning pixel art graphics and a pulse-pounding sound effects, you'll be drawn into the action from the moment you start playing. Navigate through 5 intense levels, each with its own unique challenges, as you take down hordes of zombies and buy new weapons to become the ultimate survivor. Experience the satisfaction of wiping out the undead and proving your worth in this juicy 2D shooter. Play now and see if you have what it takes to survive the Survivor's Tax.
